blocks.name: ellz1
blocks.content: Membership in a lower set of integers. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ellz1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cz), wb(wcel(c1, cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, c0))))
} = {
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wn(wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))))
  eldif(c1, cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  pm5.32da(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wn(wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  3bitr4rd(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wn(wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wn(wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1)))
  notbid(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1))
  zltp1le(c0, c1)
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  zre(c1)
  zre(c0)
  lenlt(c1, c0)
  notbid(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c1)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cz))
  peano2z(c0)
  eluz(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)
}

blocks.name: lzunuz
blocks.content: The union of a lower set of integers and an upper set of integers which abut or overlap is all of the integers. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lzunuz(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wceq(cun(cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cfv(cuz, c1)), cz))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cun(cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cfv(cuz, c1)), cz, w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  syl5bb(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cfv(cuz, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c1))))
  elun(cv(hs0), cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cfv(cuz, c1))
  bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wo(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)))))
  orbi12d(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))))
  ellz1(c0, cv(hs0))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)))))
  eluz1(c1, cv(hs0))
  syl6rbb(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wo(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)))))
  pm4.71d(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0))))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0))))
  mpd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0))), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0))))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  zred(c0, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  lelttric(cv(hs0), c0)
  orim2d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)))
  ex(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)))
  letrd(c1, cv(hs0), co(c0, caddc, nat1), wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0))))
  zred(c1, wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0))))
  simpll2(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)))
  zred(co(c0, caddc, nat1), wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0))))
  peano2zd(c0, wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0))))
  simpll1(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)))
  ad2antlr(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  zre(cv(hs0))
  simpll3(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)))
  biimpa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, cv(hs0)))
  3ad2antl1(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wb(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, cv(hs0))))
  zltp1le(c0, cv(hs0))
  andi(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cun(cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cfv(cuz, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
}

blocks.name: fz1eqin
blocks.content: Express a one-based finite range as the intersection of lower integers with ` NN ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fz1eqin(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(co(nat1, cfz, c0), cin(cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cn)))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), cin(cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cn), wcel(c0, cn0))
  bitr4d(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cn)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0)))))
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0)))), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cn0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))), wcel(nat1, cz), wcel(c0, cz))
  1z()
  elfz1(nat1, c0, cv(hs0))
  3bitri(w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wa(wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0)))))
  3anass(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wa(wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0))))
  ancom(wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))
  anandi(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0)))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cn)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  elin(cv(hs0), cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cn)
  anbi12d(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))), wcel(c0, cz))
  nn0z(c0)
  ellz1(c0, cv(hs0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0)))))
  elnnz1(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat1, cfz, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cn))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cn0))
}

blocks.name: lzenom
blocks.content: Lower integers are countably infinite. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm lzenom(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cen, com))
} = {
  sylancl(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cen, com), wbr(cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cen, cn), wbr(cn, cen, com))
  en2d(hs0, hs1, cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cn, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs1)), wcel(c0, cz))
  mp1i(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), universe), wcel(cz, universe))
  zex()
  difexg(cz, universe, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cn, universe))
  nnex()
  2a1i(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)), universe))
  ovex(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0))
  2a1i(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs1)), universe))
  ovex(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs1))
  3bitr4d(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wceq(cv(hs1), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wceq(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs1)))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs1)))))
  impbida(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs1)))))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0))))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs1)))), wa(wa(wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0))))))
  adantrr(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0))))))
  jca31(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)))))
  zsubcld(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cv(hs0), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))))
  simprl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))
  lesubd(nat1, co(c0, caddc, nat1), cv(hs0), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))))
  ad2antrl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  zre(cv(hs0))
  zred(co(c0, caddc, nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))))
  1red(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))))
  breqtrrd(cv(hs0), cle, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))))
  simprr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), c0), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, cc))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), wcel(c0, cc))
  zcn(c0)
  pncan(c0, nat1)
  eqcomd(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))))
  nncand(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cv(hs0), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))))
  zcnd(co(c0, caddc, nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))))
  peano2zd(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)))
  ad2antrl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  zcn(cv(hs0))
  ad2antll(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0))), wb(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs1)))), wa(wa(wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, cv(hs0)))))

blocks.name: elmapresaun
blocks.content: ~ fresaun transposed to mappings. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Oct-2014.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm elmapresaun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cmap, c4)), wceq(cres(c0, cin(c2, c4)), cres(c3, cin(c2, c4)))), wcel(cun(c0, c3), co(c1, cmap, cun(c2, c4))))
} = {
  mpbird(w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cmap, c4)), wceq(cres(c0, cin(c2, c4)), cres(c3, cin(c2, c4)))), wcel(cun(c0, c3), co(c1, cmap, cun(c2, c4))), wf(cun(c0, c3), cun(c2, c4), c1))
  syl3an(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cmap, c4)), wceq(cres(c0, cin(c2, c4)), cres(c3, cin(c2, c4))), wf(cun(c0, c3), cun(c2, c4), c1), wf(c0, c2, c1), wf(c3, c4, c1), wceq(cres(c0, cin(c2, c4)), cres(c3, cin(c2, c4))))
  elmapi(c0, c1, c2)
  elmapi(c3, c1, c4)
  id(wceq(cres(c0, cin(c2, c4)), cres(c3, cin(c2, c4))))
  fresaun(c0, c2, c1, c3, c4)
  elmapd(cun(c0, c3), c1, cun(c2, c4), universe, universe, w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cmap, c4)), wceq(cres(c0, cin(c2, c4)), cres(c3, cin(c2, c4)))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cmap, c4)), wceq(cres(c0, cin(c2, c4)), cres(c3, cin(c2, c4))), wcel(c1, universe))
  simpld(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cmap, c4)), wceq(cres(c0, cin(c2, c4)), cres(c3, cin(c2, c4))), wcel(cun(c2, c4), universe))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cmap, c4)), wcel(cun(c2, c4), universe), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c4, universe))
  simprd(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  elmapex(c0, c1, c2)
  simprd(wcel(c3, co(c1, cmap, c4)), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  elmapex(c3, c1, c4)
  unexg(c2, universe, c4, universe)
}
